title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
desc: Harry Potter discovers his magical heritage on his eleventh birthday when he receives a letter of acceptance to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
desc: Set on the desert planet Arrakis, Dune is the story of the boy Paul Atreides, heir to a noble family tasked with ruling an inhospitable world where the only thing of value is the 'spice' melange.

title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
desc: One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them, One Ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them.

author: George Orwell
desc: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the dangers of totalitarianism.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
desc: A story about a shepherd named Santiago who travels from Spain to Egypt in search of a treasure.
